response.answer_text: Hope currently you are doing your best for NEET 2021 and you are aware about the syllabus, preparation methods and all so I don't want to give more details about this Just a few tips or steps for the preparation I hope it will help you with the preparation The ideal plan for NEET 2021 preparation setup your timetable for NEET 2021 in that you have to set almost 2/3 hours for each subject means 9/10 hoursRefer NCERT book for preparation I must say please refer NCERT at least 2/3 times till NEET 2021MAKE NOTES while learning NCERT so that you can refer all those notes on a daily basisFor other preference, I will suggest you HC VERMA for physics, O.P.TANDAN for chemistry so that you can clear all your concepts, Trueman’s VOL 1/2 for biologyAlso please refer Objectives for NEET by MTG This is best book for the MCQ preparationClear all examples from the bookChemistry is all about concepts and basics so you need less time for preparation so that you can adjust your time in BIO and PHYSICS to solve examplesUse an online platform to SOLVE old papers like TOPPR: BETTER LEARNING FOR BETTER RESULT because in that you will get with the solution so your time will be left for other preparationPlease take care of your HEALTH because if your health is weak then you can't concentrate on preparationAll your doubt’s answer I have mentioned on these points hope you will get every answer so now just Start your preparation and do well in the exam All the best 👍

First set your target for your dream college.I mean set the target of required marks to get your dream college. I recommend 1.FOR PHYSICS Physicswallah-Lakshya batch on Physicswallah app.For this you have to pay less than 100rs per month(999 for one year)and you get live classesof physics,dpp and test series. 2.FOR CHEMISTRY -ORGANIC AND PHYSICAL Physicswallah youtube channel free content -INORGANIC Biomentors 3.FOR BIOLOGY Biomentors All the lectures on biomentors are free of cost but when you want to solve dpp,mock tests and quick revision notes then you have to pay 492rs per month. BOOKS 1.BIOLOGY Ncert+if you have allen or aakash module(not necessary) MTG Fingertips (objective) NCERT EXEMPLER 2.CHEMISTRY NCERT for physical and inorganic MS Chauhan for organic MTG FINGERTIPS or any other good objective book NCERT EXEMPLER Previous year questions 3.PHYSICS DC Pandey or HCV or BM Sharma Previous year questions NCERT EXEMPLER Make your own notes and read NCERT as many times as possible.Learn concepts and then apply them in solving mcq. Solve mcq and give test as many as possible. BEST OF LUCK!
